Source: https://www.spigotmc.org/resources/holographic-scoreboard.2700/

We use this plugin for setting specific scoreboards around spawn e.g. adding /mctop to a hologram.

A generic plugin that allows for easy creation of Holographic Scoreboards using the HolographicDisplays plugin.

Wiki

Introduction
Ever really missed a huge billboard displaying your awesome rating in some weird discipline on your server?

Wait no more! HolographicScoreboard will enable you to project anything you can get from commands displayed in beautiful holograms, and updated at fixed intervals.

Want to show the richest players on your server?

/hgs create richies 10m console baltop

Want to show the most awesome Unarmed in an mcMMO environment?

/hgs create unarmed 5m console mctop unarmed

If you want to cleanup all holograms:

/hgs cleanup

Refresh a specific scoreboard NOW:

/hgs refresh richies

Installation
This plugin REQUIRES ProtocolLib and HolographicDisplays or Holograms.

Configuration
Simply use the command line:

Code (Text):
/hgs create myscoreboard 10m console bt top pvp 1

Permission

  • One to rule-em all: `holographicscoreboard.admin`

Plugin Incompatibilities
This plugin hijacks the communication between the player and the thirdparty plugin.
Some plugins do not “play nice” in this regard (i.e. some hang up the connection, and recalls the player), so some plugins are not compatible.

  • SimpleClans
  • CraftCononmy3
  • PlotSquared

Disclaimer
This plugin utilizes Hidendra’s plugin metrics system, which means that relevant information is collected and sent to mcstats.org.
Opting out of this service can be done by editing plugins/Plugin Metrics/config.yml and changing opt-out to true.
